lead_paragraph: GILMAN--Mitzi, on February 25th, 2016. Her legacy lives on in husband Bill, daughters Marla and Cory, twin sister Lynda, brother Lee, stepsister Susan, and stepbrother Jay. Services are Monday, February 29th at Robert Schoem's Menorah Chapel in Paramus, NJ at 11am. 1/3
